section.name: Downloads
section.p:
Test release of Svarog-0.5:
one-jar (everything packed in one jar, ready to run), + plugins (unzip and put in ~/signalml/plugins),
jar-installer (an installer packaged as a jar file),
exe-installer (an installer packaged as a Microsoft Windows executable).
Alternatively you can compile from the source in the git repository.
Instructions how to compile are on the wiki.
Previous stable versions of Svarog are available as packages in the archive.

subsection.name: Matlab Component Runtime redistributables
subsection.p: If you downloaded the packaged versions and intend to use signal analysis methods which use Matlab, you will have to have the Matlab Component Runtime (or Matlab itself) installed.
Lack of MCR doesn't affect remaining functionality and may be ignored if not needed.
For details about the Matlab Component Runtime see the Mathworks site.
